category.title: Road user hazard
category.description: Pot holes, Trees, Missing signs etc

category.title: Pedestrian hazard
category.description: Damaged footpaths, Overhanging trees, Bad signage etc.

category.title: Infrastructure fault
category.description: Leaking water or sewerage, Power or telephone line down, blocked culvert etc.

category.title: Cyclist hazard
category.description: Poor visibility, lack of space, storm grate etc.
